summary: A short batch file that adds all Non-DLC shouts
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]- Are you creating a new character?
- Playtesting?
- A filthy cheater?

Well, fear not, for I have the tool for you!

This is a small batch file that gives the player all the vanilla shouts in the game.
[/size]
[size=3]All you need to do is download with NMM (or zipped, if you're into that sort of thing) and when you [/size][color=#ffff00]run the game type "[/color][color=#ff7700][size=5][i]bat shouts[/i][/size][/color][size=4]" into the console[/size][color=#ffff00].[/color]

[size=3]Congrats!
You just cheated![/size]

Also check out my BAT file for all perks, [i][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66363/?]here[/url][/i], for the cheater who needs a walking meat tank before the game has even begun!
author: ToxicBrown1

files.name: Shouts Batch File - All Non-DLC shouts  with 100 dragon souls
